title: afk in promo
body:
Just had 2 games of my promo, both games my team was winning hard and on the way to push their inhibs and one of my teammate decides to leave the game for no apparent reason (didn't say anything nor was anyone flaming) and i lost promo because of this? this is bullshit, 2 GAMES IN A ROW 

hope there is a system in place soon to deal with bullshit like this

Well c'mon, I sympathise for him, AFKs in promos are one of the only real serious reasons of why someone isn't rising in ranks. And yes it's purely bad luck too

{{champion:268}}
Not really looking for pity lol just thought issues like this need to be addressed.

Yeah never quite understood why Riot doesn't simply discount these games if you lose them or give you quite a large LP boost if you win them.
It should be very very easy for the game to discern whether or not a character has been disconnected or idle for an extended period of time, and its obvious this would have a large impact on any game.
And it always happens on promos, not any other game just the most important ones lol
